about_the_game:
Overview

In Avalon Lost, you embark on a legendary quest mixed with danger and adventure following the destruction of the town you once called home. During this quest, you will be met with trials that test your will to survive and force you to rise above the challenges that threaten the realm of Albion, all while discovering numerous stories and tales befitting the Arthurian mythos.

Avalon Lost is a Sandbox Survival Game with an emphasis on player agency, through the use of RPG elements, customizable equipment and a plethora of skills, heroic points, and statistics to ensure that you can embark on the adventure that you wish to have, rather than to have everything predefined for you.

Game Features:

  • Explore the realm of Albion, once the proud region of King Arthur, Camelot and the Knights of the Round Table. Misfortune and suffering have fallen upon the kingdom following Mordred's ascension to the throne.

  • Venture deep into the mythology of the Arthurian legends and uncover new stories and mysteries that led to the events that fell upon this once beautiful realm.

  • Progress throughout the land and create your own story, growing from that of a small township peasant to that of an adventurer, or legends beyond. Promoting character development where choices matter, actions have consequences and players hold agency in the type of legend they wish to become.

  • Rich levels of character progression expressed through over 100 skills, each with multiple active and passive abilities to utilize, countless types of equipment that allows for customization and unique bonuses to further expand upon character builds, and heroic points to emphasize additional means of character growth that serves as a foundational bonus.

  • Build and establish your own encampments and domains. Raising the banner of your claim inside of the realm and defend it with sharpened steel or potent magic.

  • Discover hidden ruins, dungeons and caverns that hide valuable wealth but promise terrible dangers to those foolhardy enough to venture through them.

  • Harvest and gather valuable resources and materials from the landscape and the world around you to support you on your quest, and further solidify the strength of your domain.

  • Venture through thirteen unique biomes, each with their own secrets, wonders and dangers alike. The realm itself is alive through the use of dynamic weather and an ever-shaping world through both action and inaction of the many factions, lordships and groups within.

  • Face off against countless foes and monsters alike, spanning across numerous biomes and covered by the looming threat of King Mordred and his armies. Boasting over a hundred unique types of enemies and foes throughout the realm.

  • Stand United or Stake Your Claim as you seek your own fortunes within Albion amongst many other players who seek to do the same within private or publicly hosted servers upwards to 50 players at a time. Though you always have a choice to venture through Albion alone if you so desire.

  • Rise up to the Legend through numerous custom difficulty options and presets that not only make selecting various challenges within gameplay easier, but it allows for you to dramatically change your gameplay experience - whether you prefer challenging combat, gritty survival, or an opportunity to venture into the unknown and chart your own path. The difficulty settings are designed to allow YOU to choose the type of adventure you want to have, and to always have more options to explore in the future when you choose to return to Albion.

    =================================================================

Narrative

With the decisive battle of Camlann concluded, the usurper, Mordred, pressed forward and reduced Camelot to cinders and ash. It was upon this desecrated ground that he ascended to the throne of Albion and set forth his tyrannical edicts.

Over the coming years, the realm was sieged from beast and brigand alike. The commonwealth, once able to live peaceful solitary lives in their townships, struggled to find safe havens and nervously prayed for to see another bright sunrise. Fortunately, life was simple for you. Days would go by as you explored the neighboring forests for food and local game, and occasionally would spend time at the local tavern when a hunting trip seemed fortuitous enough. It was during one such day that you had ventured into the forests on the outskirts of town and discovered a strange metallic fragment bathed in a faint amethyst light. Curious as to its value and qualities, you met with the local blacksmith and had him appraise it for you later that day.

With a metallic thung that resonated throughout the hovel, the metal seemed to reverberate against even the faintest of taps from a hammer. It was as if it was warded or enchanted in some way, but neither the smith nor you could tell much from this fragment, but one thing was certain, it was forged from some type of mineral that you had never seen before. From that day onward, the winds began to change around the town. The forest grew more oppressive and the landscape around the outskirts became even more restless. It was as if the land itself responded towards your actions, or more specifically, your discovery.

Merely a weeks' time from when you visited the blacksmith, you settled down to rest in the earlier part of the evening only to be forcibly awoken to the sounds of screams. Darting to the nearby window, an orange blaze reflected upon the glass as trails of smoke coated the sky in a thickened obsidian ash.

Life had been simple for you...

content_descriptors.notes: The content provided in the game is intended for mature audiences only. The content specifically implies the use of alcohol, mature language, violence, some gore (albeit non-extreme), and other actions befitting a medieval action-based game.

short_description: With the defeat of King Arthur and his knights, Mordred ascended to the throne atop the ruins of Camelot. The tyrant subjected Albion to chaos and savagery under his bloody conquest. But a glimmer of hope remains within a fragment of the legendary blade that has the power to change destiny.
